item.title: Need a Video Editor to Edit Stock Videos in an Instagram Reel - Upwork
item.description:
Heyyyy Talent Video Editor Friends!!

I'm Tiffany, the founder of frances marie (IG: @byfrancesmarie) a direct-to-consumer luxury perfume brand that uses mood enhancing ingredients to inspire Black women to feel more confident in being exactly who they are.

I'm gearing up for a Feb or March launch of my first scent and I'm in need of a really impactful Instagram Reel created for Valentine's Day. I have the storyboard with the voice over attached to the job. I'm not married to how the current layout and welcome any suggestions. I'm a marketer by trade and have worked with a lot of video genius which I am not :) But I wanted to provide something so you'll at least have a sense of what I'm looking for.

I've also included 4 stock videos that I plan to use. I have 10 in total but attaching 4 as examples. Please review and let me know your thoughts about the quality. I can also provide timestamps/clip durations that I'd like for each frame.

Now the fun part...budget.

My budget is extremely tight, as I'm gearing up to launch. Who knew creating a perfume brand from scratch WITH custom, one of a kind scent would be so expensive. But anywho, because I am a marketer I am all about paying creatives what they're worth.

But take it easy on me *No Adele* because the budget is tight. And I'm willing to put in some work where I can. For example, selecting the part of each stock video files that I like and adding it to the storyboard. Just let me know.

I feel like I'm rambling. Looking forward to connecting!!


Posted On: June 22, 2024 19:33 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, Video Editing
Skills: Instagram Reels, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
